name: Ricochet (itch) (PhillipeAmaro)
description:
A gauntlet of quick-fire twin stick shooter levels where your bullets bounce around. You are own worst enemy in this gauntlet of quick-fire twin stick shooter. Fight through a gauntlet of levels where often times your greatest enemy will be yourself, as every bullet you fire will ricochet back with a vengeance. Fire too carelessly and this twin stick shooter quickly becomes a bullet hell of your own making! 

Ricochet was made as a personal game jam with a 4 day time limit.
